general_info.summary: This document lists various programs, schools, and administrative information related to Sharda University, including its academic offerings, examination reports, student services like counselling and skill enhancement, and international campuses. It also covers operational aspects such as tenders, university acts, and guidelines for students regarding visas and insurance, alongside initiatives like an FM radio station and mentoring portal.
